field_id.title: field_id
field_id.description: The Field ID for the quest_data. This is unique.

field_name.title: field_name
field_name.description: The Field Display Name. For example: 'Forest Spiders Slain' or 'Find the Bartender'

visible.title: visible
visible.description: True or false: Whether or not to display this field in the Questbook

display_number.title: display_number
display_number.description: True or false: Whether or not to display the field number at the end of the title.

number_addon.title: number_addon
number_addon.description: If display_number is true, then this is the string that will be displayed on top of the number. Can be used to show number caps like 'Slay Zombies: 3/10'

max.title: max
max.description: The max number that the field can go up to. Put -1 in here if there is no cap

prerequisites.description: The prerequisites to display this objective in the quest book. Can be left blank.

stages.description: The actions done on certain stages (value numbers) of the Quest Field.

items.title: Stage
items.description: A stage in the Quest Field progression

value.title: value
value.description: The value that the Quest Field needs to be at in order for these actions to trigger

actions.description: The actions to be performed when the quest reaches this stage

completion.description: The actions done on completion. Can be left blank.
